results.title: The Blind Man of Siloam lantern slides
The Blind Man of Siloam lantern slides
The Blind Man of Siloam lantern slides
Thunder Mountain cinema slide
results.creator_credit: Fox Film Corporation and David Howard
results.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
results.brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: Red-blooded adventure and colourful romance in this zane grey thrilling story of the west. George O’Brien in Thunder Mountain with Barbara Fritchie Frances Grant for general admission

results.title: The World Moves On cinema slide
results.creator_credit: Fox Film Corporation and John Ford
results.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
results.brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: The World Moves On with Madeline Carroll Franchot Tone Gunn Slide Fox Pictures For general exhibition On the plain glass slide there is worn away handwriting which said: Thurs, Fri, Sat [?XXX] The two sheets of glass are held together using Gunn’s Slide branded tape: Gunn’s Slide, 9 Collins Place Melb. Cent. 2736

results.title: The Great Defender cinema slide
results.creator_credit: British Instructional Films, Associated British Picture Corporation and Thomas Bentley
results.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
results.brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: British International Pictures present Matheson Lang Margaret Bannerman. Richard Bird The Great Defender Smashing Sensation - Seething Drama of Unrequited Love.. And the Law Courts! Released by British Empire Films Ltd Not suitable for general exhibition. Coming It looks as if handwritten text has worn away as there are very faint black marks remaining.
results.creator_credit_for_label: British Instructional Films, Associated British Picture Corporation and Thomas Bentley

results.title: Orchids to You cinema slide
results.creator_credit: Fox Film Corporation and William A. Seiter
results.credit_line: ACMI has endeavoured to contact the owners of these objects since their deposit in 2015. Unfortunately this has been unsuccessful. We would welcome any information to identify the owners.
results.brief_description: Two glass sheets: one glass only and the other with slide imagery which has a monochromatic emulsion that has then been hand painted with coloured pigments or dye. TEXT on the slide reads: John Boles Jean Muir “Orchids to You!” He learned about women from her flowers! Not suitable for general exhibition The two sheets of glass are held together using Gunn’s Slide branded tape: Gunn’s Slide, 9 Collins Place Melb. Cent. 2736,
results.creator_credit_for_label: Fox Film Corporation and William A. Seiter
